__TOC__

Purpose of this page is to list the specific localized images that will be produced based on Precise, and provide the key contacts and locations for each image.  

All localized images should have testers and translation leads signed up, in addition to image build contacts.  Based on the identification of contacts for testing and resolving build issues, this information will feed into making images available on the iso tracker to coordinate any community testing required before the image is made distributed.
